website_summaries.verdict: One duck call with a unique design to produce the sound of an entire flock of ducks with a single breath.
pros: Shaker design with a special tuning hole creates the sound of an entire flock
The result sound is a high pitched call with a great amount of volume
cons: Pure duck calls are difficult to produce with the raspy sound

customer_reviews.title: feeder
customer_reviews.text: Very very good, it takes some time to learn the technique but once u figure out the right motion its awesome. u can easily make it sound rapid or stop and go. seriously does the trick. this is probably the same with all feeders like this style, but if it's below freezing the rapper will not shake good enough to make the sound
customer_reviews.author: Hvan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat call
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure my kids like it more than me... The dogs hate it.. The wife hates it a bunch.. I like it. You can get some great tones out of it, as if I try to do this with a mouth call, duck laugh at me.. The only draw back is that it requires you to move a little more than I like to move in a boat blind...
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Just shake it! Its that easy.
customer_reviews.text: Just shake it and it makes duck sounds. Doesn't get easier than this! This will put some realism in your decoy spread. Just shake it randomly and it makes a cacophony of duck chatter. There is a tuning hole you can cover or uncover to add variety by sounding like different ducks answering each other. Cant wait to try it on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: If you can’t hit that feeder on a mallard hen call, then this is for you. Works as a great substitute. All your buddy’s will make fun of you due to the call’s shape but it’s good for a laugh in the blind
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Frost

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little practice but easy to get the sound
customer_reviews.text: You have to work with it a little bit (a few minutes) but you can get it to sound just like a feeder call. Secret is to cover to call hole like it says and the end and just practice until you get the sound that you want. It's pretty easy to do though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Call
customer_reviews.text: Great finisher call. This is great both for people who are inexperienced and as a finisher. I use it to call in ducks with my right hand while my left holds my gun. This way I can call up tot he last second until I drop the call (lanyard around wrist) aim and fire.
customer_reviews.author: BJH888

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, not very loud but it is not cons at all i would say considering, it is feeding call for a close being duck
customer_reviews.author: kokosha78

customer_reviews.title: Sound good easy use
customer_reviews.text: Not good for the cold dosent work as well in the single digits. If kept in your pocket works well until it gets cold again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This feeder call works great, just some minor back and forth shakes gives the most realistic feeder call I’ve heard yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds pretty good, but is kind of soft sounding and ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds pretty good, but is kind of soft sounding and takes a lot of effort to make a feeder chuckle. Just take the time and learn how to feeder chuckle on a single or double reed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Get a rookie involved
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old can make a feeding call now! And so can rookies that want to go duck hunting with me. Great product
customer_reviews.author: PA Lineman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got it for my son's 3rd bday and he loved it. Easy to use. Great sound
customer_reviews.author: Burman fam bam

customer_reviews.title: Good call for beginners who haven't got a feeder call ...
customer_reviews.text: Good call for beginners who haven't got a feeder call down yet. It doesn't take much motion to get it going. We did notice once it got real cold or wet it didn't want to work as well.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Like the call not for beginners that are clueless to duck vocals
customer_reviews.text: Makes the proper sounds will take some getting used to . Before using this call I would advised listening to live feeding mallards to get an understanding of how they sound . If not you won't have a chance at a bird.
customer_reviews.author: Jay bird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This caller works great to grab Mallards attention without a lot of effort or movement.
customer_reviews.author: Freeland MD

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I am not goid at the feeding call. This makes it east, and you can shake it while blowing a mouth call, making it sound like multiple ducks at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a few years and have not become a very good "duck caller" This call is simple enough for even ...
customer_reviews.text: Been Hunting for a few years and have not become a very good "duck caller" This call is simple enough for even "me" to use successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works awesome, especially for some one that can't blow a standard duck call making feeding call.
customer_reviews.author: duane haugen

customer_reviews.title: YEP
customer_reviews.text: Yes I suggest u do get this it works great
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: ... carry this into the field as it attracts much unnecessary attention but have say it makes good feeder call
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if i will carry this into the field as it attracts much unnecessary attention but have say it makes good feeder call.
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: And you look kind of stupid rattling it around
customer_reviews.text: It's easier to learn a feed call than to use this thing. And you look kind of stupid rattling it around.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rubber material makes it less functional when it gets really cold. It still works but has different sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now it sounds like Daffy Duck with a
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working correctly the first time it got wet. Now it sounds like Daffy Duck with a cold
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Easy & effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to replicate real duck sounds. I used this the next time I hunted and I had a duck in the next pond over talking back to me!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Siebert

customer_reviews.title: ... - I called in chuckling a few flocks - easy on the body like it alot
customer_reviews.text: My dad used these all the time thought id try it what the heck - I called in chuckling a few flocks - easy on the body like it alot
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: He loves it perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 6 uses this. He loves it perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Preston

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must for a duck hunter
customer_reviews.text: A must for duck hunting... will turn them every time
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for. It is a far ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I hoped for. It is a far cry from the one grandpa use to have. This is a kids toy...cheap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, Why would you buy anything else?
customer_reviews.text: Just shake it. No need to learn how to blow an old style call which is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Has good sound I'm sure it will work well once I have some practice with it
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a good call. I'll have to wait until next duck season to try it in the blind but it has good sound. I haven't practiced with it much because I have to wait until my wife isn't home
customer_reviews.author: Justun Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: hand it to the worst caller in the group and have him just shake ...
customer_reviews.text: The in-law call...hand it to the worst caller in the group and have him just shake it!
customer_reviews.author: GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, very durable and not bothered by multiple drops ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a youngster in the blind, you need this. Sounds great, very durable and not bothered by multiple drops in the mud.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work alight. Just something to add to your bag of goodies
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R Jungwirth

customer_reviews.title: DUCK CALL
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY THING YOU CAN DO WITH THIS IS THE FEEDER CALL FOR SURE AND i RATE THAT AS A 7. CLOSE BUT NOT SOUNDING EXACTLY LIKE A DUCK FEEEDING.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So much easier that other duck calls. Can be a little annoying if the kids get ahold of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Beginner's Call
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband. Of course everyone laughed at him when he received it because it doesn't require blowing into the tube, However, he said it made a great mallard call. This would be an excellent product for a new duck hunter or someone who is having a hard time getting the call down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Grow

customer_reviews.title: ) Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Called a mallard in on the first day :) Great for beginners. and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super price fun to use, makes even a new jack a pro at calling.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: With its weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: The only call I can't master with my regular call but this absolutely does the trick and sounds better then most of my buddy's
customer_reviews.author: Dallas K

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner call
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good to give a new hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Todd russell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is good way to get a newby into the game.
customer_reviews.author: another

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could have been a bit louder for open feeding calls.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Yun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's easy to use but somewhat large. you wont be able to hang it comfortably from your lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity in my opinion. This call is guaranteed to work!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and Britni Browning

customer_reviews.title: Sounds real
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband !! It's hilarious , does sound real though ,
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and pulls them in. Anybody can make a good feeding call with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you blow a call like me this will come in handy, works great
customer_reviews.author: CloverValleyRanch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound, definitely a good buy and price good too
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: buddies make fun of me for it but works wonders
customer_reviews.text: buddies make fun of me for it but works wonders. first time I used it, ducks turned on a dime
customer_reviews.author: Brett Vescovi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my grandson and he was very pleased with it. It was a special request.
customer_reviews.author: J Muck

customer_reviews.title: Great call.
customer_reviews.text: My son has tried a couple of different duck calls over the years. He practices with them constantly, and this one is really easy to use. This is the only call that he's gotten that has actually fooled me into thinking their were ducks in the back yard!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder call
customer_reviews.text: This feeder call is perfect to have in your duck blind. It sounds great and anyone and learn to use it in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaipal

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend learning to do it the hard way
customer_reviews.text: If you can't do a feeding call, it works. I'd recommend learning to do it the hard way. Product is durable and well built, though.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great call the people who gave it 1 star or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great call the people who gave it 1 star or poor ratings don't know duck hunting. If you haven't mastered the feeding call this call is perfect for you. I got this call so when I'm hunting alone I can shake it with one hand and call with the other to sound like multiple ducks. Great call works well
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Feeding call for the untalented
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to show up at the field this coming year with this call. I have always been a terrible caller because I can't master the feeding call. It is my hope that this will do the trick this coming season. So far I have tested it and it has a great sound and is quite easy to use. Keeping my fingers crossed that it does the trick in the 2011 - 2012 season.
customer_reviews.author: VXH

customer_reviews.title: They always stop talking when I use it and I am very glad that I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because as a substitute teacher, I needed something to get attention from a class when they they get out of control. They always stop talking when I use it and I am very glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully! Shake it and you have a feeder call but if you squeeze it it also make a regular duck call for your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Makowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young hunters
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my young daughters could "help call." Very easy to use, very hard to misuse. Keeps the kids involved, opening whole new level of hunting experience. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bunkie Roy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, virtually foolproof.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it in the blind yet, but it sounds great. I just could never master that feeding chuckle with a conventional call. Now I don't need to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Combs

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: the ease of using this call is insane ANYONE I MEAN ANYONE can use it from children to adult, sounds so good and loud and clear, my husband has his on this lanyard now.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Makes a feeding call so easy a 2 year old could do it.
customer_reviews.author: HHOMedia

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. I bought it for kid to use when we go duck hunting. Foolproof design ensures it will work and I expect it to keep my kid engaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy peesy. I can't make a decent feed chuckle ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy peesy. I can't make a decent feed chuckle on a conventional call to save my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good guess that matters in the end but it's just not as good as I exspected it to be
customer_reviews.author: Ashby freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this the simplest feeder call u can ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this the simplest feeder call u can use but it's a way my young son can b apart of the hunt....he's to young to use a regular call but can use this and not screw up the call(sound) in any way
customer_reviews.author: Eric R

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Anyone can use it
customer_reviews.text: I feed mallards at my dock out back. I'm not a hunter. However, during hunting season I have been using this feeding call to lure them back over and away from getting shot. It works great! Anyone can use it!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: i dunno how much it sounds like a duck
customer_reviews.text: i dunno how much it sounds like a duck. kinda looks like a dildo so hey its a conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: slidez

product_meta.title: Primos Hunting 829 Feedin' Mallard Call, One Size
product_meta.description: The Feedin' Mallard is so easy; anyone can pick it up and make the feed call just like a mallard duck. When combined with your favorite duck call you sound like a flock of mallards. Features: - 100% Freezeproof - Special tuning hole in bell to sound like multiple ducks - LOUD
feature_bullets: Now every hunter in a duck blind can call ducks
Easiest way to reproduce the feed-chatter of ducks
Special tuning hole in bell to sound like multiple ducks
